title: Storm Type Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Štorm Type Foundry**

The Storm Type Foundry was founded in 1993 in Prague, Czech Republic, by type designer [František Štorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Frantisek%20Storm). It specialises in revivals of classic typefaces, and the library includes contributions by [Jan Solpera](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jan%20Solpera) and [Josef Týfa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Josef%20Tyfa).

[http://www.stormtype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/www.stormtype.com/ "http://www.stormtype.com") (English)  
 [http://www.pismolijna.cz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235829/http:/www.pismolijna.cz/ "http://www.pismolijna.cz") (Czech)
author: filip blazek
